page.title: 04New Developments in March.
page.content: { Estover House,}a large, empty, old farmhouse is now for sale and the grounds are being sold as{building {plots. Part of{March Town Football Ground} has been sold and some{bungalows}are being built there.In{St.John's Road}a new{vicarage}has been built.Old houses are being knocked down in{New Park}and are being rebuilt for{people buying a {house for the first time. There is another{new development}off Elliott Road, called{Windsor Drive. They are{detached bungalows and {houses}with hardwood framed windows and patio doors. We found that the {post code}was written on the street name and we think this is a good idea. All property, old or new, seems to have its{own garden}and we feel this is because there is{plenty of land available here.
